title: Sociology Professor Named Exemplary Teacher (Nebraska Wesleyan University)
text: ( Source : Nebraska Wesleyan University ) Sue Wortmann's students often leave her classroom grappling with the information they just learned. Not just because they need to know it for an upcoming exam, but more often because of Wortmann's
